claim: The Adjustment Bureau is loosely based on a short film.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The film tells the story of a young man who discovers that what appear to be chance events in his life are controlled by a technologically advanced intelligence network .

claim: The Adjustment Bureau is loosely based on a short film.
